verbs.description: [ARG0: snowfall wind] [V: cancel] [ARG1: season - opening men world cup race] excessive snowfall and strong winds on the rettenbach glacier have forced the cancellation of the season - opening race of the men alpine skiing world cup organizers initially delayed the start of the giant slalom by an hour but called off the event soon after as no improvement of the weather was forecast europe austrian glacier finland race director fis united states tessa worley federica brignone rettenbach glacier markus waldner italy mikaela shiffrin austria france the associated press soelden race levi sölden wind
